title: Multi-Session Microlearning Program for Strengthening Library Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic literature search
context.additional_context: BYOD-based language learning support program for current practitioners, focusing on strengthening library information literacy competencies

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for resources using subject-related keywords in academic databases.
Learners can evaluate the credibility and relevance of retrieved materials for academic assignments.
Learners can independently operate library online services (inquiries, reservations, material requests).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
